name: Saint Callistus
summary: Callistus Caravario was a Salesian priest serving in China, who along with Luigi Versiglia was martyred in China on 25 February 1930.
biography: Callistus Caravario was a Salesian priest serving in China, who along with Luigi Versiglia was martyred in China on 25 February 1930.
